system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearm Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.i5Xz1hjImCHirF7l]{Machine Gun Specialist}

Benefits

The character can fire any GPMG without penalty.

Normal

Characters without this feat take a -4 penalty to attacks made with GPMGs.
